t: Jolie Noire- An Elevated Women's Athleisure Wear Brand
s: Jolie Noire stands for Pretty Black in French. Sisters Kim and Keyondra Lockett searched high and low to find cute and comfy gear that displayed black women as the art they are. They saw a need for clothing with faces that look like theirs so they created graphics tees that truly represent them.

t: Sister Duo Launches Clothing Brand, Jolie Noir, to Remind People That Black is Beautiful. | The Women.com Podcast Episode on Amazon Music
s: Kim & Keyondra Lockett are an inspiring sister duo who worked together to build their luxury essentialwear clothing brand, Jolie Noir. In French, Jolie Noir means "pretty black" - the brand hopes to change the perception around dark colors (specifically black) being negative.

t: Target Is Now Carrying Loungewear From Jolie Noire
s: February 15, 2022 - Jolie Noire was founded by Atlanta-based sisters Keyondra and Kim Lockett, who sought to found an inclusive clothing brand that bucked against the conventional stereotype that blackness is synonymous with negativity. Instead, their brand circulates around the assertion that Black is beautiful.
